detail_desc: Bikini top with lightly padded, removable inserts, wide shoulder straps, metal D-rings at the front, wide elastic at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.
Swimsuit with a lined gusset.
Hand-made hat in braided paper straw with fringed edges.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Slippers in soft jersey with elastication around the opening. Terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a contrasting colour press-stud placket and ribbing.
Long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck and wrapover at the back.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft, printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in soft, airy, patterned organic silk with a collar, buttons down the front, long trumpet sleeves with asymmetric seams, and a slit at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long, textured-knit balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Microfibre bra with a scalloped trim at the top and underwired padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated waist with a drawstring, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Socks in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, loose-knit wool blend with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in soft, patterned satin in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut that widens at the hem. Lined at the top.
Cable-knit jumper in lightweight cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with a band and fringes at the front. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles.

Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with sections in contrasting fabric front and back. Long sleeves with wide ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Shirt in soft, washed denim with a button-down collar, classic front, and yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length, 42-49 cm.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft weave with a lace yoke and button placket. Scalloped lace trim around the neckline and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Fitted top in sturdy jersey with a square neckline and long sleeves.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline and sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velour hooded top with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Classic T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Straight cut with short sleeves.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 7 cm.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre with laser-cut edges, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and flounce at the front and hem.
Fully lined joggers in woven fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Fake fly, side pockets, back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Jersey lining.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with lightly worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a flap chest pocket with a press-stud, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit containing some mohair with a boat neck, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in a fine-knit with long raglan sleeves.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a patterned lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One-button fastening at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Tops in soft slub cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and short puff sleeves with a scalloped trim. Scalloped trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem.
Wide waist belt with narrow ties that can be wound around the body and fastened at the front. Width 8 cm.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck opening and buttons down the front. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Set with a bodysuit and pair of leggings in printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Jersey-lined corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and one back pocket.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an extended section at the hem in a cotton weave. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short V-neck dress in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with slits in the sides and no buttons.
Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in woven fabric with a wide flounced trim at the top. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side seam and straight, wide legs with side pockets. Unlined.
Car coat in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide collar, buttons down the front, welt side pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a zip in one side, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Tapered legs with plastic sparkly stones and raw-edge hems.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Loose-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and a racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Long-sleeved tunic in jersey crêpe with a rounded hem.

Trainers with imitation leather and imitation suede details, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with flounces at the top in a broderie anglaise weave.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a round neck and long, raglan sleeves.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton seersucker. Top with flutter sleeves and a wide, elasticated neckline with a decorative bow. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in patterned twill made from viscose and Tencel™ lyocell with decorative trims. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Side pockets and a twisted tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Fitted jumpsuit in sturdy jersey with a heart-shaped neckline at the top, wide shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Slim legs with sewn-in creases.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
